bill.title: Uniform Probate Code; Guardianship; Adult; Rights; Communication
bill.description: Prohibits guardians of an adult ward from restricting the ward's right to communicate, unless it is deemed by the guardian to pose a risk to the safety or well-being of the ward. (HB1585 CD1)

history.action: Prefiled.
Introduced and Pass First Reading.
Referred to HUS, JUD, referral sheet 1
Bill scheduled to be heard by HUS on Tuesday, 02-02-16 9:00AM in House conference room 329.
Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org

The committees on HUS recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Morikawa, Kobayashi, Creagan, Hashem, Fukumoto Chang; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Jordan, Oshiro; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Belatti.
Reported from HUS (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 57-16) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with Representative(s) Har, Jordan voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Creagan, San Buenaventura, Say excused (3).
Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Thursday, 02-25-16 2:00PM in House conference room 325.
Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org

The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 12 Ayes: Representative(s) Rhoads, San Buenaventura, Belatti, Brower, Creagan, Hashem, Kawakami, C. Lee, Takayama, Woodson, McDermott, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Morikawa, Nakashima.
Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 934-16) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 03-08-16.

Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with Representative(s) Ichiyama, Kong voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Choy, Har, Oshiro voting no (3) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 195).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to JDL.
The committee(s) on JDL has scheduled a public hearing on 03-14-16 10:00AM in conference room 016.

The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 7 Aye(s): Senator(s) Keith-Agaran, Shimabukuro, Gabbard, K.Kahele, Kim, L. Thielen, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3021) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1).
48 Hrs. Notice 03-28-16.
Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 22; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 3 (Senator(s) English, Nishihara, Shimabukuro). Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 362) in amended form (SD 1).
House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).

Senate Conferees Appointed: Keith-Agaran Chair; K.Kahele, Shimabukuro.
House Conferees Appointed: Morikawa, Rhoads Co-Chairs; Brower, McDermott.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 652).
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 611).
Bill scheduled for Conference Committee Meeting on Friday, 04-22-16 9:00AM in conference room 229.

The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 3 Ayes: Representative(s) Morikawa, Rhoads, Brower; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) McDermott.

The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 2 Aye(s): Senator(s) Keith-Agaran, Shimabukuro; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) K.Kahele.
Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 10-16) as amended in (CD 1).
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Friday, 04-29-16.
Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 10-16).
48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 04-29-16.
Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1). 22 Aye(s); Aye(s) with reservations: none . 0 No(es): none. 3 Excused: Senator(s) Harimoto, Ruderman, Slom.
